overview:
Tal Sliwowicz is the Senior Vice President, Product Strategy and Development at Invoke Solutions.

Tal brings 14 years of experience architecting and delivering software and managing product development initiatives to his position as SVP of Product Development. He has been with the company since early 2000 in his previous role as VP of Software Development where he was a key player in developing Invokeâ€™s mobile research platform and improving the online research experience. Prior to joining Invoke, Tal developed a multitude of products including health care management software and reporting tools. He holds an LLB Law Degree from Tel Aviv University, and an MBA from Northwestern University (Kellogg School of Management) and Tel Aviv University (Kellogg Recanati School).

Source: Invoke Solutions
